is used to load the value of a variable which may reassigned by 'set!'. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["indirect", <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(let ((a "a"))
  (set! a "b")
  a)</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [constant "a"
   [argument
   [constant 1
   [argument
   [close 0
      [box 0
      [constant "b"
      [assign-local 0
      [refer-local 0
      [indirect
      [return]]]]]]
      [apply]
   -1]]]]]
[halt]]</code></pre>
